channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Bon Jovi Revisit ‘Forever’ LP With Bruce Springsteen, Jelly Roll, and More
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends unite! Bon Jovi collabs with Springsteen, Jelly Roll, and more on their ‘Forever’ LP. Let's turn up the volume! 🔥 #BonJovi #NewMusic

item.title: Gwen Stefani & Blake Shelton Producing Modern Day Wizard Of Oz Remake
item.description: 🌈 Follow the yellow brick road with Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton as they cook up a magical Wizard of Oz remake! 🎶✨ #MusicNews

item.title: John Fogerty to Play CCR Songs on “Legacy” Tour Dates
item.description: 🎸 Rock legend John Fogerty is taking us back to the good ol' days with CCR songs on his upcoming tour! 🌟 #MusicLegends #CCRRevival

item.title: Billie Eilish Announces New UNO Deck After Calling Out Its “Garbage” Rules
item.description: 🎵 Billie Eilish is bringing her vibe to UNO with a new deck! ♠️ Who's ready to play by her rules? 🔥 #BillieEilish #UNOGameChanger 🃏

item.title: Iceland Airwaves announces full 2025 lineup
item.description: 🎶 Iceland Airwaves bringing the heat with their 2025 lineup! 🌟 Who are you most excited to see? #MusicFestivalGoals #LiveMusicMagic
